rooms.description: Spacious area for living and entertaining with large windows to bring natural light. Bohemian decor with vibrant colors and textures.
Modern farmhouse kitchen with open design, incorporating local cooking styles and Vastu elements like the placement of the sink and stove for positive energy flow.
Cozy dining space adjacent to the kitchen to support family meals and gatherings.
One of two guest bedrooms with a private balcony facing a garden area, designed for relaxation and privacy.

openings.description: Large casement windows ensuring ample daylight. Positioned per Vastu guidelines to allow positive energy flow.
Door opening leading to the backyard and pool area.

special_features.description: A private swimming pool integrated into the landscape design with natural stone borders and water features aligning with Vastu water element placement.
